overview: Thai filmmaker Ken Nannapat (Smith) first outing in documentary filmmaking entails a melancholic half fiction half docu post modern poem captured during a trip in Thailand's Phuket. A visit to his distant aunt (on his father's side) who he hasn't seen for more then a decade since his father abandons him, Isolated Silence like a ghost is a project of heavy uncontrollable reflection ribbing through Nannapat's only trusted outlet; cinema.
title: Isolated Silence
